posts.post_content:
Plenty of ways to break this, my favorite at the moment is two [Sensei's Divining Top](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sensei's Divining Top)s and an [Etherium Sculptor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Etherium Sculptor).  
  
Play down both tops for free, tap ability of one puts it on top, tap ability of the other puts it on top and the other in your hand, which you can then play for free, repeat ad infinitum.
